title: Back to the Fundamentals — Bishop Barron’s Sunday Sermon
itunes:title: Back to the Fundamentals — Bishop Barron’s Sunday Sermon
description: Friends, I have often said that Lent is a bit like basic training for the military or summer workouts for a football team—it is a chance to get back to the fundamentals of the faith, namely, the Ten Commandments. In this homily, I look at each of the Ten Commandments, using them as an examination of conscience for this Lenten season.
